job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p>Experienced software developer to create a UI on top of existing SDK and API’s for new product development of spectro-radiometric instrumentation.</p><p><br></p><p>Proven experience creating a modern, effective UI for instrument control. Ease of use, visual appearance, presentation of data, and complex plotting features are critical.</p><p><br></p><ul><li>Good communication skills and ability to document work</li><li>Results orientated individual able to work quickly and effectively to complete project on-time</li><li><strong><u>7 years related work experience</u></strong> developing software to control scientific instrumentation and report empirical information.</li><li>Extensive experience in <strong>C#</strong>, <strong>C++</strong>, and <strong>Visual Studio</strong></li><li>Additional experience working with Telerik UI for WinForms, Lua and Protobuf</li><li>Familiar with <strong>LabView</strong>, <strong>Python</strong> and <strong>MatLab</strong> working environments a plus</li><li>Familiar with <strong>Linux</strong> based operating system a plus</li><li>Strong testing and debugging skills</li><li>Experienced working in a <strong>Scrum Team/Sprints</strong> development process</li><li>Working knowledge of <strong>GitHub</strong> for source control and release</li><li><strong>BS in Computer Science and/or Electrical Engineering</strong></li></ul>
